TopicTitle: Builings in Career mode fully upgraded

Articles.Content:
Hello KSP Team and other players,

i bought ksp yesterday (18th of January 2015) on steam. Now i wanted to start a Career, but all my buildings are fully upgraded when i hit start new game. I dont think that this is normal... Thought i have to upgrade them...

BTW, i am using Dimmdrive.

I would appreciate any help

Have a nice flight!

Welcome aboard!

That's a known bug in the Windows 64-bit version. Try using the 32-bit version, it is much more stable and bug-free.

Welcome aboard!

That's a known bug in the Windows 64-bit version. Try using the 32-bit version, it is much more stable and bug-free.

wow, that was fast, thank you!
